enWisdom: Intellect is the vehicle of knowledge
Intellect is the vehicle of knowledge
The intellect is the root of knowledge and the herald of understanding
Verily you are gauged by your intellect, so develop it with knowledge
Through the intellects, the pinnacle of sciences (or matters) is attained

Wisdom: كُلُّ عِلْمٍ لَا يُؤَيِّدُهُ عَقٌلَ مَضَلَّةٌ
enWisdom: All knowledge that is not supported by the intellect is misguidance
The intellect is an inborn quality that increases through knowledge and experience

Wisdom: الْعَقْلُ وَالْعِلْمُ مَقْرُونَانِ فِي قَرْنٍ لَا يَفْتَرِقَانِ وَلَا يَتَبَايَنَانِ
enWisdom: The intellect and knowledge are joined together in one linkage, they neither separate nor do they differ

Wisdom: الْعَقْلُ مَنْفَعَةٌ وَالْعِلْمُ مَرْفَعَةٌ وَالصَّبْرُ مَدْفَعَةٌ
enWisdom: Intelligence is an advantage, knowledge is an elevation and patience is a defence [and a means of repelling hardships]
The intellect is the herald of understanding

Wisdom: الْعَقْلُ وَالشَّهْوَةُ ضِدَّانِ وَمُؤَيِّدُ الْعَقْلِ الْعِلْمُ وَمُزَيِّنُ الشَّهْوَةِ الْهَوَى وَالنَّفْسُ مُتَنَازَعَةٌ بَيْنَهُمَا فَأَيُّهُمَا قَهَرَ كَانَتْ فِي جَانِبِهِ
enWisdom: Intellect and lust are opposites; the supporter of the intellect is knowledge and the adorner of lust is vain desire, and the soul is contended for between the two, so whichever is triumphant, it is on its side
